summary:
Financial industry  ⎮  securities services ⎮ payment & cash management   ⎮  strategy setting and execution  ⎮  business development  ⎮  project management  ⎮  multicultural environment  ⎮  strong network  ⎮ 
A proud quote from a client: “I speak for all of us when I say that you personally really made a difference”.
